medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain for 3 days with subjective fevers.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced RLQ pain for 3 days, with subjective fevers. There have been no episodes of nausea or vomiting, no diarrhea or constipation reported, and no hematochezia or melena. The patient states this is unlike any previous pain they've experienced.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diverticulitis, Hypercholesterolemia, Anemia, Osteoporosis, Osteoarthritis, Monoclonal gammopathy, Leukopenia, Pulmonary hypertension, Polymyalgia rheumatica, Hypertension
